name: Super Mario Bros. 1-1 Winter Special
description:
A Short SMB. 1-1 Remake Available to play directly from your browser.

F1 =Fullscreen ON ,F2 = Fullscreen OFF

Controls : 

Right : right key

Left : left key

Jump : up key

FireBall : X

Duck : Down key

Sprint : S
